parse.title: List of monuments of Pope John Paul II

text.*:
This is a list of monuments and memorials to Pope John Paul II.

Contents

  • 1 Argentina
  • 2 Bosnia and Herzegovina
  • 3 Croatia
  • 4 Germany
  • 5 Italy
  • 6 Lithuania
  • 7 Philippines
  • 8 Poland
  • 9 Portugal
  • 10 Slovenia
  • 11 Spain
  • 12 United States
  • 13 See also

Argentina[edit]

  • Posadas

Bosnia and Herzegovina[edit]

  • Sarajevo

Croatia[edit]

Monument of Pope John Paul II in Trsat.
  • Trsat

Germany[edit]

  • Hanover

Italy[edit]

  • Rome

Lithuania[edit]

  • Šiluva
  • Kaunas

Philippines[edit]

Pope John Paul II Tower in Bacolod, Philippines
  • Bacolod
  • Malolos

Poland[edit]

  • Kraków,
    Krakow Archbishop's Palace courtyard, 1980

  • Wołomin, Pl. 3 Maja

  • Bielsko-Biała, monument by Jan Kucz, 2006

  • Tarnów, cathedral, monument by Bronisław Chromy, 1981

Portugal[edit]

Braga, Sameiro Sanctuary
  • Fátima
  • Braga

Slovenia[edit]

Statue in front of basilica in Brezje, Slovenia
  • Brezje

Spain[edit]

  • San Cristóbal de La Laguna
  • Sevilla
  • Madrid
Bronze statue outside the Cathedral Basilica of Denver.

United States[edit]

  • Chicago (2)
  • Wyandotte, Michigan
  • Denver
  • Hamtramck, Michigan
